objects.text:
• German Markrolon Polycarbonate Shell
• Lightweight Design - Only 3.65g
• 8 Smooth Hinomoto Wheels
• Built-in USB Charging Port

product_details.description: Accessibility just made a move to the next level. No cap. Our classic Cabin Luggage has now evolved! The Cabin Pro is designed for quick access to help you breeze through security. UNDESTRUCTABLE GERMAN MARKLON POLYCARBONATE SHELL: Casing: Hard LIGHTWEIGHT & INDUSTRY BEST STORAGE: Capacity: 40liter, Weight: 3.65 grams, Dimension : 57.8 x 37 x 24.3 cm SILENT RUN JAPANESE WHEEL TECHNOLOGY: Number of wheels: 8, Super Smooth Hinomoto Wheels THE MOST FEATURE RICH LUGGAGE: USB Port: 1, Powerbank not included, Lock Type: TSA Number Lock, Comes with magic eraser, Dust Bag & Laundry Bag Water resistant: Yes Outer material - Polycarbonate ** Water resistance level - Water Resistant ** Country of Origin - India **

banner_details:
The banner features a futuristic-themed promotional layout for a travel accessory. It includes a dark geometric background with diagonal accents in bright yellow-orange gradients. The top left segment includes a bold, high-tech style headline (`heading`) followed by a vibrant secondary title (`subheading`) below it. A thin accent line (`decorative_line`) separates the main offer text from the outlined product features (`description`) listed in clean bullet points. The call to action includes a prominent price display (`price`) and a vibrant yellow button (`cta_button`) labeled with a contrasting bold sans serif text (`cta`). To the right, the suitcase image (`product_image`) is centrally aligned and overlaps the rich accent background.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Teal: #1F3A3A
- Accent Yellow: #FFB700
- Gradient Yellow-Orange: #FFA000
- White: #FFFFFF
- Call-to-Action Text: #1F3A3A
product_color: The product image features a stylish suitcase with a sophisticated color palette of deep olive green, vibrant mustard yellow, and accents of black. The primary color, olive green (#4B5743), offers a rugged and premium look, ideal for travel gear. Mustard yellow (#F5B700) adds energy and contrast, strategically used along the zippers and the inner compartment lining to create visual interest. Black (#1C1C1C) is used subtly for details like wheels and the handle, grounding the palette. The colors blend harmoniously—green dominates, yellow highlights key functions, and black provides structure—making it ideal for a dynamic and bold advertisement banner.
